entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
